mapper.select: SELECT sc.sno AS sno, student.name AS sname, content.contentID AS contentID, content.submitTime AS submitTime, content.score AS score FROM sc JOIN student ON sc.sno = student.id JOIN homework ON sc.cno = homework.cno LEFT JOIN content ON homework.homeworkID = content.homeworkID AND sc.sno = content.sno WHERE homework.homeworkID = #{homeworkID};

SELECT c.contentID, c.fileName as fileName, COALESCE(score.score, null) as score, COALESCE(score.content, 'No comment') as comment FROM content c LEFT JOIN score ON c.contentID = score.contentID AND score.sno = #{sno} WHERE c.contentID = #{contentID};

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN score = 0 THEN 1 END) as score_0, COUNT(CASE WHEN score BETWEEN 1 AND 3 THEN 1 END) as score_1_3, COUNT(CASE WHEN score BETWEEN 4 AND 6 THEN 1 END) as score_4_6, COUNT(CASE WHEN score BETWEEN 7 AND 9 THEN 1 END) as score_7_9, COUNT(CASE WHEN score = 10 THEN 1 END) as score_10 FROM content WHERE homeworkID = #{homeworkID};
